resources.string:
NZTides

Based on official LINZ tide predictions so should be accurate. Transcription errors are unlikely but possible. This program shouldn't be used where life or property is at risk. No Warranty. 

Predictions run till about the end of 2012.

Released under the GPLv3. See code.google.com for source code. Program copyright Jevon Longdell, tide data (presumably) under Crown Copyright.
